version_name: synchronization with Qrafter free version                                                                                                                                                                                Released Dec 10

version_description:
• Minor fixes
• Framework updates

• Much better detection for incomplete URLs in codes generated by other generators
• Framework updates

• When you change the color inside the app on iOS 10.3 and later, the app icon will change its color accordingly too
• App color updates
• Framework updates

• Added labels to barcodes
• Changed barcode dimensions for a more standardised look
• Added "More" button to barcode results
• Updated frameworks

• Added favorite button to history screen for easier access to favorites
• Updated code parser
• Updated frameworks

NOTE: iOS 8.x is no longer supported.
• Minor updates

• Added Waze support
• Updated code parser

IMPORTANT: This version crashes on iOS 11 when saving a generated code image to Photos. Next version will fix that.

• Redesigned user interface for iPad
• Updated user interfaces for all screens for a lighter, more modern look
• Updated icons
• Support for iOS 11
• Support for creating native WiFi connections on iOS 11
• Better support for sharing on native Twitter and Facebook apps
• Under the hood improvements

17.1:

• Fixed a crash that occurred when saving a code image to Photos

17.0:

• Redesigned user interface for iPad
• Updated user interfaces for all screens for a lighter, more modern look
• Updated icons
• Support for iOS 11
• Support for creating native WiFi connections on iOS 11
• Better support for sharing on native Twitter and Facebook apps
• Under the hood improvements

• Drag and Drop support on iPad on iOS 11 with the following features:

- Drag and drop code images directly into Qrafter Pro for immediate scanning.
- Drag and drop code images from Qrafter Pro to any app that can open images.
- Drag and drop any text or URL into Qrafter Pro to start a QR Code creation process.
- Drag and drop from history screen to get the raw data for any item.

• Universal app links support to launch Qrafter Pro from any other app or from a webpage using https://qrafter.com/x-callback-url/scan/ URL, with x-callback-url support for easy code scanning on any app

• Proper AES-256 encryption instead of DES when encrypting QR Codes.
• Interface fixes for iPhone X. It is now fully supported.
• Other general updates

• App background color selector
• Framework updates
• Minor fixes
• Minor fixes
• Minor fixes
• Routine framework updates
• Minor optimizations
• Minor fixes
• New detection framework added for even faster detection of barcodes.

• PDF417 scanning and creating support on iOS 11
• Framework updates
• Routine framework updates

• Codabar support
• Framework updates
• Framework updates

iOS 12 support
iPhone XS, XS Max and XR support
Code 93 support
Amazon.com.tr support
x-callback-url updates
Framework updates

• 3rd generation iPad Pro (2018) support

• Added base64 encoding option to x-callback-url support
• Corrected a versioning error

• General updates

Added the ability to start creation process for 2d codes and barcodes using x-callback-url
Added Safari as an in-app browser option
Updated Italian translations thanks to Agostino Anselmo
Updated other translations
Updated frameworks

• Removed embedded Twitter support
• Updated external file handling

• Default in-app browser changed to Safari

• CSV file new line fixes

• Framework updates

• Changed email QR Codes from SMTP: format to more widely accepted mailto: format
• Changed version numbering system
• Updated frameworks

• Removed embedded Facebook support
• Added small interface updates
• Updated frameworks

• Added ability to automatically copy the result to clipboard after a successful scan
• Fixed an unwanted trimming issue for WiFi codes
• Other minor updates

• Added easy reach buttons for edit name, favorite, delete controls and for activating the iOS action sheet, directly to the result page of a scan.
• Updated frameworks
• Framework updates

• iOS and iPadOS 13 support
• Dark mode support
• iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro support
• Updated icons and interfaces
• Updated frameworks

• Handoff support
• Framework updates
• Small fix for a design bug on history screen

• Fixed a bug that resulted in a crash upon launch on iOS 9.
• Removed Google Safe Browsing support, because it is now an expensively paid service unless the app using it is non profit or a mainstream browser.
• Moved text creation option higher on the list on create screen as it is one of the most used options.
• Fixed a bug that caused the create screen list order appear wrong on iOS 12 and earlier. Sorry for the inconvenience.
• Transition version before deploying new history sync method

• Shared history for Qrafter and Qrafter Pro. When you start to sync history with iCloud, both apps will have access to the same history.
• Minimum required iOS version is now 10.0.
• Fixed a bug which made it impossible to enter the letter "V" when creating Code 39 or Code 93.
• Added phonetics support to vCard parser and generator
• Fix for date selection while creating event codes
• Framework updates
• Fix for a configuration error that prevented uploading files to iCloud
• Fixed a bug where scan count on history csv export would be wrong
